alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MENOMINEE AND EASTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 707 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keshena, or 10 miles northwest of Shawano, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Legend Lake and Keshena around 710 PM CDT. Shawano around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pulcifer, College Of Menominee Nation, Lyndhurst, Advance, Landstad, Zachow, Shawano Lake, Lunds, Morgan, and Thornton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
